author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is inspired from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/34378.
In commit 0daa900 a unit test to check basic functionalities of the `conddb` script is added.
In commit 2927fc9 a protection for `conddb diffGlobalTagsAtRun` is added, in order not go in error if it's run=1 (that's MC)

#### PR validation:

The newly introduced unit test passes:
```
scram b runtests_test_conddb
```

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Introduce `conddb` script unit tests
